website_summaries.verdict: Great entry-level foosball table that's easy to transport from room to room. We recommend a 2-person assembly team. Stylish mahogany-style veneer.
pros: Solid metal rods spin freely and resist bending
cons: Some parts are plastic, not metal chrome

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting to get a foosball table for our family rec room but I kept saying that we didn't have space. This table is a nice size, very sturdy, and well-made. He was able to put it together in an afternoon and, while I hate to admit when I'm wrong, this is a great purchase. We've had some fun family matches and the kids enjoy playing with their friends. Hooray! Something to do inside that doesn't involve electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W

customer_reviews.title: Nice Foosball table but takes a lot of time to build.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the directions could have been better. This was a big assemblage piece. Many screws and bolts. Probably took close to 3 hours easy. I build and DIY around the house, so I am not new to projects. The table simply takes a lot of time. Directions could be clearer. The many bolts and screw packages are labeled well. But the diagrams could be better in certain steps during the build. Overall the foosball table seems sturdy and we as a family enjoy it. I would recommend this product for buying. Overall 4 star just because of the time to put together.
customer_reviews.author: S.O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: So I was a little scared about putting this table together from reading reviews. But not be this guy but it is not that bad everybody. Myself and my 7 year old son did it in couple hours. Go slow, look diagrams and it all goes smooth. I will say the only thing I did for the players and poles was to use the pictures on amazon for that. The diagram was not greatest for pole placement. But great table. Plays well. Very steady and solid frame. Be lots game play on this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The table has lasted and still looks great after hours of play
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Triumph table to keep in the break room at my warehouse. The table has lasted and still looks great after hours of play. The table is always getting moved because we are remodeling and it still looks like we just pulled it out of the box! I assembled it myself fairly quickly, all I had to do was follow the instructions and the pictures on the manual. This table is a bargain for the elegance it gives off and for the quality of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Garza

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, Great table. Took like 3 hours to put together. I used a cordless drill as there was NO WAY i was hand screwing everything! There where no predrilled holes to make it easer. Thats why i gave it 4 stars. Predrilled holes would have been nice as there are ALOT of pieces, good thick wood. Now that its together i love it.....didnt so much love the install LOL But worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are not the best - but there is a YouTube video to help.
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to lie - I had some issues assembling this table. It wasn't great - BUT their customer service is OVER THE TOP! They went over and above to help me out - and continued to reach out to make sure everything worked out. The table itself is solid and really nice looking. This was a Christmas gift for my husband so I did a lot of research and I am glad that I landed on this.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Martin

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking table
customer_reviews.text: This table has been a huge hit at our house! I grew up with a similar table and decided it was time for a classy looking table that could be used by friends and friends kids alike. Took a little bit of time to build (mind you I did it by myself) but would have been pretty quick if I had asked for some help. Had a few questions for customer service while I was building and Lisa helped me out within a few hours and got me on the right track (thank you!). Would certainly recommend this table to anyone looking for a fun and attractive game piece.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good product even better Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for our office's lounge and we absolutely love it. Our clients have given us compliments on how sophisticated it looks with the rest of our space and with how well it works.The product was just as described, we had a mishap where the courier was not gentle with our product, but if this happens just contact the seller directly we were so lucky to have Lisa help us out the customer service she provided to us was absolutely amazing she really went above and beyond to send us a replacement piece and even emailed us a tutorial on how to set up our table. I highly recommend this product and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Pasadena

customer_reviews.title: We love this table
customer_reviews.text: We love this table, and liked the option of using different player and ball styles. Overall, this is a great table and we expect to get a lot of life out of it. However, the screws that hold the handles onto the rods are garbage; several of them stripped out right away. I just replaced them all with screws from the local hardware store. Would have been 5 stars if not for this. Seems like it’s really hard to find a super high quality table on Amazon. Not sure where the pubs and sports bars are getting theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: The order was delayed a few days -- which honestly, over a holiday weekend, wasn't a big deal. The table does require some effort to put together. I've assembled many IKEA pieces of furniture in the past; this was a bit more challenging. There are few pre-drilled holes and the assembly instructions are sparse in details. Still, with a drill bit, I was able to make my own holes and assemble the beast of a table. It is quite sturdy once assembled. Some of the pieces were damaged during shipping. Their customer support took care of me and shipped replacement parts. Overall, great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andre Turgeon

customer_reviews.title: Great table but the “players” are not well-balanced.
customer_reviews.text: Our family likes this table, and we use it frequently. Assembly was not hard, especially with the YouTube videos. I bought aftermarket rubber grips because the wooden handles were too skinny and not balanced. My only issue is that the human-like players are not balanced properly, so there is no way to stick their legs in the air. The negative result is that when you’re playing 1:1 your offensive players’ feet are always blocking the shots of the defensive players. The table comes with another set of faceless non-human players, so perhaps the problem doesn’t exist with them. (To find out I have to disassemble the players and pole and handles...
customer_reviews.author: Anna Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Like many, I was looking around and trying to find a nice table without a massive price. This table is very nice, sturdy, looks good, and plays well. Pricing for the quality is very fair. If you are thinking of buying I wouldn't hesitate to recommend. Also, I called for the free rod lubricant and the person I spoke with was very nice and helpful. You would think on a free-bee they wouldn't take their time with you but I could tell they care about the products and the customer. Great table!
customer_reviews.author: What I'd Want to Know Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Iffy instructions
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my kids. Everything arrived in good shape. The materials appear to be good quality and it's holding up well in its first few weeks. The instructions left a lot to be desired. My dad is a television repair man and has an awesome set of tools but I still struggled in spots. It took me about 4 hours to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cass

customer_reviews.title: Not what we hoped
customer_reviews.text: Not as durable, substantial or solid as the picture and description led me to believe. It is more than a toy, but not by much. Grown people passing a competitive game will be disappointed by its light weight, shallow playing area and plastic leg brace.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: We shopped around for other tables and after reading several reviews we went with this table. Our 7 & 8 year old love it and we have weekly competitions with friends and family. Very happy with this purchase. The customer service is outstanding. Super responsive. It’s heavy and I thought it was damaged through the shipping process. It’s really protected and it was just the protective MDF damaged. Customer service followed up 2 times afterwards just to ensure satisfaction. No damage to the table. Well balanced, good playing surface, a lot of fun. Lube up the rods and good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Foosball Table And Excellent Custom Service!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality foosball table that comes with counter balanced players as well as uniformed players. Comes with the option to use 1 or 3 goalies, and corner triangular ramps for single goalie option to make sure the ball stays in play! Called them due to needing to replace 2 player rods and handle screws, as well as some rod silicone lube, and they are sending it out right away with no cost and even tracking on the shipping. Excellent customer service and a Quality American Made Foosball Table. You couldn't ask for more folks! Thank You Kick , You Guys Rock!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent...with a little liquid nails
customer_reviews.text: Solid table, but highly recommend using construction adhesive (liquid nails) to tighten up everything. The walls in particular, which take the most abuse, are held together with the chrome corner piece. This is less than ideal when you have teens banging away at a foosball table. Upgraded a few of the screws as well and found the finish product to be sturdy and well balanced. Otherwise very pleased with the price/performance on this game room addition.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian W Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Quality and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The parts arrived very well secured and protected by packaging. Assembly was straight-forward once we found the online instructions on youtube. All of the parts were included except for a handful of small screws for mounting the players. I contacted customer service and Lisa was extremely helpful and fast in getting us the replacement parts. The table is really good quality and plays beautifully. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Epicurious George

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Very professional. Putting it together took forever and not easy. You better have experience putting products together. My family loves playing on it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: B. A.

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot research online prior to purchase and it seemed this table was high quality at a fair price. I was a bit concerned about assembly but figured it is a one time process. To my pleasant surprise assembly was simple and straightforward by just following the video instructions. My friends and family, especially the grandchildren really enjoy playing. It is sturdy and plays like an arcade version. I am most satisfied and would recommend this model for your home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service - Post purchase
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, when I wrote my review I didn't expect anyone to respond but this nice gentleman called within days to find out the exact issue and then offered to send me the replacement poles. The new poles are now in place and we love the table. My two boys play on it regularly and we are starting to get really good at it. Great family sports, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andasol

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the foosball table for a public area. It has been holding up very well considering the high usage. I also liked the extra parts just in case something gets lost or broken. Most of all, I was very positively surprised by the great customer service. One part went missing and the customer service associate replied to my message in less than 24 hours and offered to resend a part. That's what I call 5-star service.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Sears

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy because of assembly issues!
customer_reviews.text: Directions are horrible! With no predrill holes, you need a power screwdriver. But a power screw driver can strip screws which are very difficult to take out if you make a mistake. Well if the directions are horrible, it is very likely you are going to make a mistake. Therefore these problems ruin the integrity of the table. Ruined Christmas morning for my kids because we have to take it apart. Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: I am excited about this foosball table
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to buy the table from Amazon but I am glad I did. It was delivered vet quickly and was very well protected inside the box. It was a little difficult to put together ( I would recommend a purchase the assembly option unless you have 3-4 hours, assistance, and patience) but once I put it together it looked very nice and appear to be very sturdy and well made. I am very excited to start enjoying this foosball table with my friends. Also, customer service was very great. And they answered my phone calls and responded to my emails quickly when I had some questions.
customer_reviews.author: Tareq H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product - bought for work, so used 6 hours a day and it is holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: 4knet

customer_reviews.title: does not work well
customer_reviews.text: balls get stuck and its an eyesore. Going to cancel prime if this eyesore is not taken care of . Neither Amazon or the seller made any attempt to mitigate. Expensive piece of JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Table!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of fun and good materials. Instructions were lacking details and somewhat incomplete. Mainly part of the handle assembly and ramps for corners instructions were missing. All materials were there. Once together, it is a nice, sturdy table.
customer_reviews.author: Ro Bo

customer_reviews.title: So far we love this table
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this table. I purchased it for my production guys and they play it everyday at lunch. It is very durable. Takes 2 hours or so to assemble so make sure you have plenty of time and beer!
customer_reviews.author: msod

customer_reviews.title: Great table with excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The foosball table is well worth the price! I had a few small problems with parts and Alex resolved the issue and exceeded my expectations. Buy with confidence, you'll enjoy playing! Make sure you call Lisa and get the video for assembly or any issues you may have.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Easier to assemble than expected
customer_reviews.text: The game arrived and was easier to assemble than what other reviews suggested. The table is sturdy enough to withstand young kids playing on it. I would recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are poor. The first thing they tell you to do ...
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are poor. The first thing they tell you to do is assemble the men onto the rods.... When that is the last thing you do. There is one step without a hole predrilled.... They do not tell you where to put bumper stops.... Table itself is nice looking... Time will tell if durable. Smooth play so far.
customer_reviews.author: agm

customer_reviews.title: parts missing and cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: This came w parts missing and product is made of cheap materials. DO NOT BUY IT. Spend a few more dollars and get a real product.
customer_reviews.author: IRINA ROLLER

customer_reviews.title: Solid table complimented with good customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Solid table and as previous reviews have mentioned you need some time to assemble. I would suggest following along the various YouTube assembly videos that exist (good tips on how to ensure your table is squared). Was missing some minor items (small green plug for corner returns and cup assembly bracket) - called support line and they were prompt courteous and quick to assist.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Professional
customer_reviews.text: Got for daughter & family for Cmas...seems sturdy & Professional. Enjoyed during my visit and great for indoor activity!
customer_reviews.author: John McLin

customer_reviews.title: Very satisified customer / Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase. Great quality product and quick accurate shipment. I'm sure we'll have hours of fun with it. Lots of pieces, but we were aware / expected that. Table was exactly as we expected, and it is the perfect addition to our game room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great value, customer service! Easy assembly instructions! Good looking and have been very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Randall LaCrosse

customer_reviews.title: Our second table and far more superior
customer_reviews.text: We have daily games with both family and friends (pre-virus) and find it sturdy and worthy of 5 stars. The post support communications and proactive response has been excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Made from very solid and sturdy materials. We've really enjoyed the table so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Made from very solid and sturdy materials. We've really enjoyed the table so far and look forward to plenty more games. The table is holding up very well, and shows no signs of wear and tear. Customer service is great as well. When I requested additional men so we could have a three goalie line-up, they replied immediately and sent the extra parts at no cost!
customer_reviews.author: Eric West

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table. Very good looking and well made
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table. Very good looking and well made. Plus customer service is excellent. I called them about the assembly and they were incredibly nice and helpful. Don't hesitate to buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Hildy Sastre

customer_reviews.title: Overall a solid foosball table
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was straightforward if you follow directions carefully. The table has withstood aggressive gameplay so far, and am enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Y.

customer_reviews.title: This is the good one
customer_reviews.text: This is a well liked product and was easily assembled.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived sooner than estimated and in perfect condition. I left the assembly to Amazon, so it was easy for me. Foosball was the hit of our family Christmas Eve celebration, enjoyed by teens and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the ass to build. Directions were very complex Other that its ok
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to set up, but I guess to be expected when it’s a substantial table. Great quality and having a lot of fun with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Xtoulax22

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, Kids love it. put it together in hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Co should supply extra screws
customer_reviews.text: The screws to hold the wooden handles to the metal poles strip easily and the handles get loose Had to buy new screws . Very annoying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table, well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table, well constructed, plays well. Took 2-3 hours to build. Decent directions. Great quality and buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Not recomanded
customer_reviews.text: I truly have several bad comments about this table but instead of going around and around this is the bottom line : LOW quality table , screws goes bad super fast. I did not even start to use the table and its already unusable and none of this to do with the installation .
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: High quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! One of the few Foosball table with a 5 star rating (according to foosballsoccer.com) that is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the quality of this table for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the quality of this table for the price. Assembly took about two hours, you certainly need a power screwdriver to speed things along. The quality is good and the kids are enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Great table, better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy table for the money! The only thing better than the table is the customer service! Well done Kick!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Di Iorio

customer_reviews.title: Great company great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great company great product! Non stop fun since Santa brought it to the house!
customer_reviews.author: bkettmann

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty foosball table
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to purchase something this expensive online, but I am glad I did. It took about 2 hours for my husband to put together (a lot of little screws). The table was heavy, but because most of the weight was in the metal rods, we were able to carry it upstairs in pieces and didn't need to hire help to move it (might need to if we ever take it back down the stairs). It is really a pretty table and those that have played said it is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: rlj1082

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy table with nice clean and modern lines! Our family has enjoyed it very much!! Awesome table for the price. Customer service is very helpful, too!! We highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table, it is not the easiest thing to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table, it is not the easiest thing to put together but as a family we enjoy it immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick OShaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, lots of fun - We’re super satisfied with this product and can highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Westhoff

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table for our office. We needed a replacement table because ours had seen better days. This one met all our needs and is very stylish. All my employees love it, and the handles turn smooth. Easy to put together as well which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table and awesome customer service!! Definitely worth the purchase! Great size too.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great Foosball Table!
customer_reviews.text: We love this foosball table. It was not the easiest thing to put together, but worth it in the end. It looks great and is a favorite in our game room.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The table is great my family loves it. Easy to put together. Rochelle
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Delacruz

customer_reviews.title: Table looks great and seems to be well built
customer_reviews.text: Table looks great and seems to be well built. Would recommend as an addition to any man cave/game room. -M
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: As advertised....great table and instructions to put together were straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product whole family loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this fooseball table and was very pleased. Great product whole family loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ford

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise all the pieces were there and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Was slightly difficult to put together. The directions didn't help much. Otherwise all the pieces were there and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Carman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the Triumph is top notch! I play it with my boys every night. When we lost a screw in the handle (the boys really work it over and spin excessively), customer support replied and sent us a new set of screws ASAP. Great quality with great customer support is why I choose KICK.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Words Man 😎

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. A big hit with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Daddio

customer_reviews.title: Great table and exceptional customer service!
customer_reviews.text: These guys did a fantastic job. I had one problem, they called me multiple times and sent me extra parts for the table without charge. Really some of the best customer service I have ever had, the table is fantastic and I am very happy across the board with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Cutter

customer_reviews.title: A Great Looking, Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that I did not buy a table that is even less expensive than this. This one is resilient, and easy to clean. I had it properly leveled, and the ball does not roll around all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatest customer service of my life.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I had some issues but Kick contacted me and went above and beyond to make it right. I could not be more pleased with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Sieczkowski

product_meta.title: KICK Triumph 55″ Black Foosball Table
product_meta.description:
About KICK Foosball Tables

Foosball is back! Our founder, a 25-year veteran of the sport and a recognized Foosball enthusiast, dreamed of high-quality game table that other Foosball lovers could enjoy- without the high price. After years of research, design and development, KICK was born, creating a new standard in Foosball tables. KICK it old-school style and get your very own KICK Foosball Table today!

About The KICK Triumph Foosball Table

The KICK Triumph was designed for the serious Foosball enthusiast who also enjoy relaxing during play. The chrome detailing against the black color of the table make a striking contrast. The elegant chrome detailing is found on the chrome edging on the body, the trim for the ball return and the ball dispenser holes,the round leg casters, and the support beams on both sides of the table. End every game in triumph with your new KICK Triumph!

Technical Specifications:


-Table Weight: 119 Lbs
-Premium Bearings
-Sturdy 5" Leg Levelers With Rubber Bottom
-Ball Return on Each Side
-Slide Scoring Mounted On Each End 
-1-Goalie or 3-Goalie Design (Player Preference, Kit Included)
-8 Durable 5/8" Semi-Solid Stainless Steel Chome-Plated Rods
-2 KICK Premier and 2 Soccer Balls
-13 Red and 13 Blue Counter Weighted Foosball Men and a Set of 26 Uniformed Men
-8 NoSlip Wooden Handles 
-2 Chrome Cup Holders (Optional Installation)
-Free & Fast Shipping
-Lifetime Warranty (Only on New Tables Purchased from KICK)
- Free Rod Lubricant (Upon Request and Shipped Separately, Contact KICK with your shipping address)

 Your 100% satisfaction is our #1 priority. If there is anything we can do to improve your experience or if you have any questions, concerns, or are not 100% satisfied please call KICK Foosball now and we will do everything to make it right. Remember all KICK tables have a LIFETIME warranty on all parts, so rest assured you’re covered!
feature_bullets: Comes With Counter Balanced Men Set AND Uniformed Men Set
Table Dimensions: 55" L X 30" W X 36" H

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
